name: Endless Virus (Falcon13)
description:
Fight against robots that are infected by a dangerous virus, buy weapons, perks. And survive as long as you can. Or escape via buyable ending :)

*Disclamier : This game was made in 2 weeks as a personal challenge. There will be some bad map designs, poorly optimize graphics, ui and bugdet cuts model (free 3d model and self design :)) ) . So don't expect much from this game :) . But there will be update in the future. So leave your feedbacks below.
